article_title: Broward Health CEO remembered as charismatic, tireless, passionate about patients
article_text:
Nabil El Sanadi was an emergency physician and hospital administrator

He died Saturday from a gunshot wound, apparently self-inflicted

Colleagues remember him as tireless, passionate about healthcare

article_metadata.news-keywords: Nabil El Sanadi, Broward Health, North Broward Hospital District, suicide, gunshot, hospitals, Florida
article_metadata.description: An emergency room physician and the top administrator for Broward Health, one of the nation’s largest public healthcare systems, Nabil El Sanadi immersed himself fully in the practice of medicine — caring for patients while also overseeing the day-to-day operations of a $1.8 billion-a-year network of hospitals, trauma centers and community clinics.
article_metadata.title: Broward Health CEO remembered as charismatic, tireless, passionate about patients | Miami Herald
